option.guicompass.must_have_compass_in_i: When enabled, will only show the GUI compass when a compass is present in the inventory.
option.guicompass.rgb_r.tooltip: The red RGB value for the compass text.
option.guicompass.rgb_g.tooltip: The green RGB value for the compass text.
option.guicompass.rgb_b.tooltip: The blue RGB value for the compass text.
